item.title: A p-value picture
item.description: Much ado and to say about the p-value. Let me add one more point; actually not really from myself, but from Diez, Barr, and Cetinkaya-Rundel (2012), p. 189; good book in one is looking for “orthodox” statistics. library(tidyverse) ## ── Attaching packages ────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse 1.2.1 ── ## ✔ ggplot2 3.0.0 ✔ purrr 0.2.5 ## ✔ tibble 1.4.2 ✔ dplyr 0.7.6 ## ✔ tidyr 0.8.1 ✔ stringr 1.3.1 ## ✔ readr 1.
